item.title: InterContinental New York Barclay
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This boutique hotel in the Manhattan neighborhood of Nolita features a private rooftop and rooms with free WiFi. The Bowery subway station is 1 block from this New York hotel.
Guest rooms at the Nolitan Hotel provide a 37-inch flat-screen cable TV and an iPod dock. The bathrooms provide bathrobes and slippers.
The hotel provides free bike rentals and a local gym membership for guests. There is also on-site dining at the French bistro Cantine Parisienne. A complimentary wine and cheese hour is served every Monday through Saturday.
Times Square, Rockefeller Center and Madison Square Garden are 4.8 km from The Nolitan Hotel. The hotel is bordered by SoHo, Little Italy and Chinatown.
NoLita is a great choice for travelers interested in nightlife, food and culture. In this area you can shop 'til you drop for popular brands like Apple, H&M, Zara, Prada, Ralph Lauren.
We speak your language!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:3:{i:0;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:20:"Best Rate Guaranteed";s:18:"policy_description";s:287:"We guarantee that the rates found through our official website are the lowest in comparison to other online sources for same day searches. If you find a lower rate with the same kind of room and conditions, please contact us and we will gladly match it or even beat it upon verification.";}i:1;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:22:"Early Departure Policy";s:18:"policy_description";s:279:"Guests will be asked to confirm their departure date upon check-in. Guests may change their departure date without penalty at the time of check-in. An early departure fee of one half night’s room and tax applies to guests checking out prior to their confirmed departure date.";}i:2;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:16:"Guarantee Policy";s:18:"policy_description";s:328:"A valid credit card will be required upon CONFIRM booking; For credit card reservations, the same card(s) must be presented upon check in at the hotel. Hotel management reserves the right to cancel any reservations without notice if we are notified of any fraud or illegal activities associated with the full payments received.";}}

a:3:{i:0;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:20:"Best Rate Guaranteed";s:18:"policy_description";s:287:"We guarantee that the rates found through our official website are the lowest in comparison to other online sources for same day searches. If you find a lower rate with the same kind of room and conditions, please contact us and we will gladly match it or even beat it upon verification.";}i:1;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:22:"Early Departure Policy";s:18:"policy_description";s:279:"Guests will be asked to confirm their departure date upon check-in. An early departure fee of one half night’s room and tax applies to guests checking out prior to their confirmed departure date.";}i:2;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:16:"Guarantee Policy";s:18:"policy_description";s:328:"A valid credit card will be required upon CONFIRM booking; For credit card reservations, the same card(s) must be presented upon check in at the hotel. Hotel management reserves the right to cancel any reservations without notice if we are notified of any fraud or illegal activities associated with the full payments received.";}}

a:3:{i:0;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:20:"Best Rate Guaranteed";s:18:"policy_description";s:287:"We guarantee that the rates found through our official website are the lowest in comparison to other online sources for same day searches. If you find a lower rate with the same kind of room and conditions, please contact us and we will gladly match it or even beat it upon verification.";}i:1;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:22:"Early Departure Policy";s:18:"policy_description";s:279:"Guests will be asked to confirm their departure date upon check-in. Guests may change their departure date without penalty at the time of check-in. An early departure fee of one half night’s room and tax applies to guests checking out prior to their confirmed departure date.";}i:2;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:16:"Guarantee Policy";s:18:"policy_description";s:328:"A valid credit card will be required upon CONFIRM booking; For credit card reservations, the same card(s) must be presented upon check in at the hotel. wp:commentmeta.wp:meta_value: Vous obtenez ce que vous payez

item.title: Le Ritz Bar Paris
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This boutique hotel in the Manhattan neighborhood of Nolita features a private rooftop and rooms with free WiFi. The Bowery subway station is 1 block from this New York hotel.
Guest rooms at the Nolitan Hotel provide a 37-inch flat-screen cable TV and an iPod dock. The bathrooms provide bathrobes and slippers.
The hotel provides free bike rentals and a local gym membership for guests. There is also on-site dining at the French bistro Cantine Parisienne. A complimentary wine and cheese hour is served every Monday through Saturday.
Times Square, Rockefeller Center and Madison Square Garden are 4.8 km from The Nolitan Hotel. The hotel is bordered by SoHo, Little Italy and Chinatown.
NoLita is a great choice for travelers interested in nightlife, food and culture. In this area you can shop 'til you drop for popular brands like Apple, H&M, Zara, Prada, Ralph Lauren.
We speak your language!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Le Ritz Paris 15 Place Vendôme 75001 Paris 75001 Paris
